alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 31 at 12:49AM PST until February 01 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY... The National Weather Service in San Francisco has issued a High Wind Warning, which is in effect from 4 AM early this morning to 4 AM PST Thursday. * WHAT...South winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Coastal North Bay to portions of the north Central Coast. * WHEN...From 4 AM Wednesday to 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 50 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast
